message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'll give you a fair share, but don't expect me to be generous!
This is my final offer. I'm not sure how much longer we can keep playing this game.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not falling for it!
Let's split it down the middle.  This is the only way we both get something.
I'm not buying the'split it down the middle' act. You're trying to trick me!
We're running out of time.  This is my last offer. Take it, or risk getting nothing at all.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm going to take what I can get now.
